sentences.english: Bearings allow the shaft to turn while permitting the housing to remain still.
sentences.chinese: 軸承允許傳動軸轉動的同時允許殼體保持靜止。

sentences.english: The vessel containing the solution is stoppered with a glass stopper and is allowed to stand for 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 將裝溶液的容器用玻璃塞子塞好並靜止10分鐘。

sentences.english: We have an orbiting electron but a stationary nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一個在軌運行的電子和一個靜止原子核。

sentences.english: The Awakened One remains unmoving, and action arises by its self.
sentences.chinese: 覺者保持靜止，行動會自動發生。

sentences.english: It is because his feet move on, but his head stays still.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲他的腳動了，而他的頭保持着靜止。

sentences.english: Love speaks up louder, and immobility itself becomes spectacular.
sentences.chinese: 愛情要高聲，靜止本身要壯觀。

sentences.english: Keep the horse's head up and still to make your farrier's work easier.
sentences.chinese: 讓馬擡着頭並且靜止能使蹄鐵匠的工作更加容易。

sentences.english: Now if we rotate the viewport the background image will remain still.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我們如果旋轉視角，背景圖像仍會保持靜止。

sentences.english: Throw a stone into still water and watch the ripples spread in rings .
sentences.chinese: 投一塊石頭到靜止的水裏，看漣漪盪漾成圈。

sentences.english: A full set of static only perseverance, two months can first efficacy.
sentences.chinese: 整一套靜止只有鍥而不捨，兩個月就可初見功效。

sentences.english: PEA does not mean mechanical quiescence.
Must not the mind-heart be utterly still and silent for the being of the Real?
sentences.chinese: 心靈爲了那真實的存在不該完全地靜止和安靜嗎？

sentences.english: Signs, mile markers, trees zip past my unmoving form.
sentences.chinese: 跡象，英里標記，樹木，快速抹去我那靜止的形狀。

sentences.english: The infinite sky is motionless overhead and the restless water is boisterous.
sentences.chinese: 頭上是靜止的無垠的天空，不寧的海波奔騰喧鬧。

sentences.english: This world has some absolute motion relative static, right?
sentences.chinese: 而這世上還有些絕對運動中的相對靜止吧？

sentences.english: Get the rock as still as you can.
sentences.chinese: 你要儘可能使石頭靜止不動。

definition: immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
to throb/to pulse/to bounce/to jiggle/to jump about
to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
